title: Bug 24390[Welcome] Ctrl+Tab should tab out of the welcome page
OB: build 2001001Ctrl+Tab currently tabs to the next text widget/paragraph in a welcome page.This is not the appropriate behavior from a user point of view.The user considers the welcome page as one entity and doesn't care that it ismade up of multiple StyledText widgets.If you ctrl+tab in IE it gets you out of the page and to the next IE widget(the link combo box).
EB: Bug 24390[Welcome] Ctrl+Tab should tab out of the welcome page The welcome editor should behave the same, ctrl+tabshould take you out of the editor immediately.
